Multiquest's website

You can choose between 4 players :

  • Assassin : fast and strong
  • Elf : use magic power
  • Ork : robust and use magic
  • Warrior : very robust and balanced

Pillar gros

Pillar petit : test

Pillar is a markup language written in the Pharo programming language. Pillar allows to export documents in html, latex and others.

This website is developed using Pillar and Ecstatic
Candy theme by Guillermo Polito.
